тЖТThe Rajshahi Water Development Board has advised not to panic over rumors that the districts of Padmapur will be submerged due to the opening of all the gates of the Farakka Dam in India.

тЖТThe Water Development Board in Rajshahi has advised that we should not lean on rumors that the district on both sides of the Padmapur will be submerged due to the opening of the Farakka Dam in India.

тЖТAccording to the officials, with the water having raised a little, the water level of the rivers is under the danger zone in the Rajshahi area. There is no possibility to overcome the danger zone by the next 4 days.

тЖТAccording to officials, the water level has increased slightly in the last six days. However, the water level in the Rajshahi district is still below the danger level. There is no danger of crossing the danger line in the next 4 days.

By Hasan Mahmud
